About

About the NTTFL

By NTFFL Commissioners

Established in 2011, the New Trier Fantasy Football started out as an amateur league of 8 people, and has since developed into the premier 12 person league in Cook County, Illinois. Only 5 of the original 8 remain, with the rest having joined after the leagueâ€™s first year. Led by commissioner Jack Miller and Assistant Commissioner Nat Swinger, the NTTFL uses ESPN as its platform for fantasy football. It is a 0.5 points per reception league, with the rest of the scoring rules standard.

To view the league page on ESPN, click the link and log in: http://games.espn.com/ntffl

Nat Swinger and Jack Miller run the NTTFL website.


Website created in 2017 by Nat Swinger
